summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite for the HomeKit integration in Home Assistant, covering configuration handling, accessory creation, lifecycle management, and the behavior of various HomeKit accessory types (lights, switches, sensors, fans, locks, media players, thermostats, covers, security systems, etc.) using mock objects and utility helpers.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correct operation of the HomeKit component, ensuring accurate mapping between Home Assistant entities and HomeKit accessories, reliable configuration processing, and stable runtime behavior to prevent regressions in the smart home integration.
